Client

Teacher & Leadership Programs

The Department of Education's Teacher and Leadership Programs comprise of 5 cohorts of grant recipient schools and districts.

We first created a brand family and style guide for each of the programs and extended the existing parent style guide to reflect the updated look (and make it 508 compliant.)

We then applied this strategy to update a rather complicated Drupal user experience (many types of authenticated and non-authenticated user stories) and large set of education materials to support the grantees and the great work they do in our education system.
